blocks.name: ofsubeq0
blocks.content: Function analogue of ~ subeq0 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofsubeq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cxp(c0, csn(nat0))), wceq(c2, c3)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wceq(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cxp(c0, csn(nat0))), wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  ralbidva(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))
  bitrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cmin, c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c0, nat0)
  subeq0ad(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cxp(c0, csn(nat0))), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0))))), wfn(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), c0), wfn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0))
  offn(c2, cmin, c3, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  inidm(c0)
  ax-mp(wfn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0), wf(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, csn(nat0)))
  fconst(c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  ffn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, csn(nat0))
  eqfnfv(hs0, co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), c0, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wb(wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c2, c0), wfn(c3, c0))
  ffnd(c2, c0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  ffnd(c3, c0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c2, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: ofnegsub
blocks.content: Function analogue of ~ negsub . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofnegsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wceq(co(c2, cof(caddc), co(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c3)), co(c2, cof(cmin), c3)))
} = {
  offveq(hs0, c2, caddc, co(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c3), co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), c0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cneg(cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  offn(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cmul, c3, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wfn(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), c0), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  fnconstg(cneg(nat1), cc, c0)
  offn(c2, cmin, c3, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  eqtrd(cfv(co(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c3), cv(hs0)), cneg(cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ofc1(cv(hs0), c0, cneg(nat1), cmul, c3, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c1, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  negcli(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  mulm1d(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), caddc, cneg(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cfv(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  negsubd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cmin, c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  ffnd(c2, c0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  ffnd(c3, c0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc))
  inidm(c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cc)))
}

blocks.name: ofsubge0
blocks.content: Function analogue of ~ subge0 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofsubge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wb(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cofr(cle), co(c2, cof(cmin), c3)), wbr(c3, cofr(cle), c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cofr(cle), co(c2, cof(cmin), c3)), wbr(c3, cofr(cle), c2), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  ralbidva(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  subge0d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cr, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cr, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  ofrfval(hs0, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cle, co(c2, cof(cmin), c3), c0, nat0, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wfn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  fnconstg(nat0, cc, c0)
  offn(c2, cmin, c3, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cmin, c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  ofrfval(hs0, c3, cle, c2, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  ffnd(c3, c0, cr, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr))
  ffnd(c2, c0, cr, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr))
  inidm(c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cr), wf(c3, c0, cr)))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cof(cmin), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
